core_id¶

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

core_timestamp¶

Timestamp inherited from IAS core processing. It correspond to the time when the value has been read from the remote system.

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

running_id¶

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

value¶

Integer that indicates if the alarm is SET (alarm raised) or CLEAR (alarm cleared).
